metadata.synopsis: Wanting to be closer to family, Mr. Chan (Edwin Pang) and his wife (Cecilia Fong Sing Lee) relocate from Hong Kong to Australia in order to live near their daughter, Bing (Annie Yip), who resides in Sydney. Though other Chans remain abroad in Germany and back in Hong Kong, the parents of the clan try to settle Down Under, along with two younger sons, but their presence puts Bing on edge. Can Mr. and Mrs. Chan adjust to a considerably different life in Australia?
